website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo C40 gives you everything you need in an affordable all-in-one PC, along with a refreshing level of future-proofing.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing All-In-One Computer~
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday, but I already love it! It came exactly like the specs I chose, and honestly, it's a lot lighter than I expected, I feel like it's less than 12 pounds. The computer itself is big though. The foot of the computer is great and has rubber feet which really help prevent it from moving around the table. It also has really decent sound, I was shocked because it was only at 50% and it was loud. It's a great computer to watch movies on. My only problem is all the preloaded Lenovo apps which haven't been a problem, but I just don't like how it's installed already.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Herrera

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my kids to do their homework ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to do their homework in December of 2015. It is rarely used other than to do homework since they also tablets.WEll 5 mos after purchasing it is no longer working the computer froze. We tried to restart it and now all we get is a black screen. I took it in to a computer repair shop and they tell me it is more expensive to repair than to buy a new computer. Basically I threw $$ down the trash. Irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, tech service lacking
customer_reviews.text: Good product once I got the software working. Lenovo 's customer service needs a serious upgrade. I had a problem with Microsoft's browser from day one! I spent 2+ hours every day over a 4 day period before a Lenovo tech was finally able to fix my problem in 5 minutes by helping me delete the browser. Lenovo techs are too busy trying to read a script and pass the problem to another department. I'm fairly certain Lenovo farms their tech service off overseas, so good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Bamano1

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive home computer
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this computer is a good deal. It isn't very powerful but does everything necessary for a home computer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hornbeck

customer_reviews.title: No wifi???????
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desktop, had it for two weeks and the wifi card failed. Sent it back, got a replacement (took three weeks) and the damn wifi card failed AGAIN. Piece of s***. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jace D.

customer_reviews.title: NO Touch Screen! No Power Chord! Horrible Customer Service!

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fast to set-up.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set-up. I was up and running in 20 minutes. Typically, when I get a new computer it takes hours to update its software. This computer was ready to go out of the box. It comes with 30 day free trial of McAfee security and 30 day trial of Microsoft Word.

customer_reviews.title: great computer. I wish it had another slot for ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great computer. I wish it had another slot for RAM and the molding around the screen is pretty thick, but those are smaller nit-picky things. I've been using the computer for a few months now and everything has worked great. Response is snappy, picture is clear, and for the price it is way better than I was expecting! Lenovo did a great job putting in a quality processor and other components to make this a solid 4.5/5 star machine.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this a few weeks ago and am super satisfied. It fit my budget and immediate needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few weeks ago and am super satisfied. It fit my budget and immediate needs. I had to get Microsoft Office for it and mostly use if for my academic assignments and personal use. It is easy to carry and install. it comes with a keyboard and mouse with chords. I hope to get the bluetooth pair soon. The resolution is amazing, the size of the screen makes it comfortable to work with. My favorite feature are the speakers. The sound is AWESOME for watching movies or any form of entertainment. I don't regret this purchase at all. I do plan to upgrade the memory since it is only about 8gb of RAM.

Say NO to this system and find something better.
